attributes.action: Bring in legislation that will make civil servants, administrators and executives of all governmental and Quasi-governmental bodies personally liable for the results of their decisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the vast extension of both regulation and government expenditure the officials and others who administer all of this should have personal responsability, and, where appropriate, financial liability for the consequences of their decisions.
This should cover amongst others, such matters as 
- wastage of public funds, 
- personal injuries, losses or damage suffered as a result of improper administrative decisions.
